Network

Lykke Ecosystem

Lykke is building a regulated blockchain-based market infrastructure that will enable institutional accessand bring long-term patient liquidity to the crypto economy, improve price discovery, and decrease volatility.

Settlement

The Lykke Exchange has pioneered interoperable and scalable infrastructure for settlement on public blockchains. We have extended the original infrastructure, which operated on Bitcoin’s OpenAsset protocol, to the Ethereum-based ERC20 standard. Limitations in transaction capacity are overcome using bidirectional micropayment channels of the Lightning Network type.

Global Liquidity Network

Lykke is creating a global liquidity network, which will aggregate the liquidity of tokens that are listed on major international trading venues, including Lykke’s own. All price making is supported by the algorithmic models of our Alpha Engine.

Regulated venues

We have opened subsidiaries in the United States, Mexico, the United Kingdom, Singapore, Cyprus, and Switzerland.

We have also obtained a Vanuatu Security Dealers license for Asia and Africa and a Cyprus CIF license for the European Union.

What is it?

About LKT

The Lykke Utility Token is an ERC20-based token that confers the right to obtain and pay for future services within the Lykke Ecosystem:

Professional services

  • A variety of data services: streaming market data and historical outlook data, consumer data from investing to spending habits, and rewards or payments to clients for agreeing to share personal data
  • Country-specific tax reports
  • Collateral for margin trading or peer-to-peer lending
  • Channel collateral
  • Listing fees paid by the issuer
  • Custody fees paid by the user
  • Liquidity fees
  • POS merchant fees
  • Preferential access to ICOs

Rebates/discounts

  • Discounted exchange fees for professional traders
  • Reduced fees when investing in LKK liquidity
  • Reduced asset management fees
  • Reduced fees for peer-to-peer lending
  • Rewards for new quant/algo models
